mapper.select: select user_num, reply_content, reply_date from reply
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_num, user_num, review_num, reply_content, reply_date) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{user_num}, #{review_num}, #{reply_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content=#{reply_content}, reply_date=sysdate where reply_num=#{reply_num}
